paper_abstract: C.Calude, A. Nies, L Staiger, and F. Stephan posed the following question about the relation between plain and prefix Kolmogorov complexities (see their paper in DLT 2008 conference proceedings): does the domain of every optimal decompressor contain the domain of some optimal prefix-free decompressor? In this paper we provide a negative answer to this question. (c) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Not every domain of a plain decompressor contains the domain of a prefix-free one
